title: Age Calculator
description: Calculate your exact age in years, months, days, hours, and minutes
metaDescription: Free age calculator - Calculate your exact age in years, months, days, hours, and minutes. Find out when your next birthday is and what day of the week it falls on.

form.title: Enter your birth date
form.targetDateHint: Leave as current date to calculate your age today

info.title: About the Age Calculator
info.description: This calculator allows you to determine your exact age in years, months, and days. It also calculates your age in total weeks, days, hours, and minutes, providing a comprehensive view of the time elapsed since your birth.
info.usage: You can use the optional 'Calculate age at' field to determine how old you were or will be on a specific date. This is useful for calculating your age on historical or future dates.
